Balu Kaimu: That is correct. Just as I can communicate with Ulu Kaimu, I can communicate with my other brothers as well. But Chuta Kaimu cannot communicate with Ulu Kaimu. I can communicate with both, but I cannot channel all their wisdom. We Kaimus share our wisdom through a complex process. For so it is ordained by my mother, Shilen, that we cannot monopolize our wisdom.
